body_html: Can you please elaborate on what the problem is? In the numpy world at least the matrices of shapes (802, 277) and (802, 1) or alternatively (802, 277) and (802, ) vector seem reasonable to work with without reshaping. None of these works for me here. Also please provide the reshape fix so that I can verify. Thanks.
